What’s Inside

Terms and conditions

  • This E-Code is valid for upto 2 months from the date of purchase.
  • To activate this E-code, SMS ACT < space ><16-Digit Card Number>< space >< 6 digit Card Pin > to 9704200300
  • This E-Code is redeemable at more than 30 participatory brands across India. For locations, visit - http://luxegiftcard.com/store-locator
  • This E-Code is for one-time use only and cannot be redeemed on multiple brands / merchants.
  • In case the value of the merchandise exceeds the value of the gift card, the difference shall be paid by the bearer. No refunds/credit note shall be issued for unused part of the E-Code.
  • Multiple E-Codes may be used in one transaction.
  • Protect the E-Code and PIN to avoid misuse. Reliance Brands Limited or Qwikcilver Solutions Private Limited shall not assume any liability in case the PIN gets stolen / compromised, Reliance Brands Limited shall neither replace the E-Code nor refund in any form.
  • Once issued, E-Code cannot be cancelled or blocked.
  • E-Code can be redeemed only against full priced merchandise.
  • For balance enquiry & expiry please SMS <16 digit card number> to 9704200300 or visit any merchant location. For complete T&Cs, please visit www.luxegiftcard.com
  • Reliance Brands Limited reserves the right to change / modify / add / delete any of the terms & conditions of the offer at any time without notice
  • SBI Card shall not be liable if any partner has temporarily or permanently shut down its operations.
  • Benefit can be availed only by visiting the participating brand stores as mentioned in http://luxegiftcard.com/store-locator.
  • At the time of redemption at the store, user has to provide 16 digit gift card number and 6 digit pin at the time of billing.
